Sentencas: As part of a study of the long-term operation of solid-oxide fuel cells, three (Mn,Co,Cr)(3)O-4 samples have been synthesized and characterized.
Titulo: Cation distribution in spinel (Mn,Co,Cr)3O4 at room temperature

Sentencas: X-ray and neutron diffraction patterns from the powder samples at room temperature were measured and the data were co-refined.
Titulo: Cation distribution in spinel (Mn,Co,Cr)3O4 at room temperature

Sentencas: The neutron data were indispensible in locating Mn, Co and Cr within the crystallographic unit cell with their respective atomic occupancies.
Titulo: Cation distribution in spinel (Mn,Co,Cr)3O4 at room temperature

Sentencas: Two of these samples have been identified as cubic Mn0.76Co0.58Cr1.66O4 and Mn1.28Co1.72O4.
Titulo: Cation distribution in spinel (Mn,Co,Cr)3O4 at room temperature

Sentencas: The third is a two-phase sample containing cubic Mn1.66Co1.34O4 and tetragonal Mn2.05Co0.91O4 in a 59.1 (6): 40.9 (6)% mass fraction ratio.
Titulo: Cation distribution in spinel (Mn,Co,Cr)3O4 at room temperature

Sentencas: Cr, which might be introduced from reaction with chromia during oxidation of interconnect materials, exhibits a preference for the octahedral site rather than the tetrahedral site.
Titulo: Cation distribution in spinel (Mn,Co,Cr)3O4 at room temperature

Sentencas: Without Cr, Mn dominates the octahedral site.
Titulo: Cation distribution in spinel (Mn,Co,Cr)3O4 at room temperature

Titulo: Cation distribution in spinel (Mn,Co,Cr)3O4 at room temperature
